Banner.Description: I have 4 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I specialize in writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and occasionally in Laravel, applying good development practices and standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 4 years as a developer, I seek to learn every day. At the same time, I have worked writing unit tests, implementing continuous integration.
My skills also include implementing improvements in systems, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):

Contact.Title: Say Hello!
Contact.Content: I'll be happy to receive your message if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I'll reply as soon as I see your message.
